targets.query: SELECT mean("uptime") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(percentile("usage_user", 100), 5s) FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" =~ /^$cpu$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "rack" =~ /^$rack$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(percentile("usage_guest", 100), 5s) FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" =~ /^$cpu$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "rack" =~ /^$rack$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(percentile("usage_system", 100), 5s) FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" =~ /^$cpu$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "rack" =~ /^$rack$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(percentile("usage_iowait", 100), 5s) FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" =~ /^$cpu$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "rack" =~ /^$rack$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 1s)*8 FROM "net" WHERE ("interface" =~ /^$interface$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "rack" =~ /^$rack$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s)*8 FROM "net" WHERE ("interface" =~ /^$interface$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "rack" =~ /^$rack$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE ("dc"='datacenter' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "rack" =~ /^$rack$/  AND "interface" =~ /^$interface$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE ("dc"='datacenter' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "rack" =~ /^$rack$/  AND "interface" =~ /^$interface$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT mean("used_percent") as used FROM "mem" WHERE ("dc"='datacenter' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "rack" =~ /^$rack$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s), *

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE ("dc"='datacenter' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "rack" =~ /^$rack$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT mean(total) AS "total", mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE ("dc"='datacenter' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "rack" =~ /^$rack$/  AND "path" =~ /^$mountpoint$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("dc"='datacenter' AND "name" =~/^$disk$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "rack" =~ /^$rack$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(writes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("dc"='datacenter' AND "name" =~/^$disk$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "rack" =~ /^$rack$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("dc"='datacenter' AND "name" =~/^$disk$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "rack" =~ /^$rack$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_bytes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("dc"='datacenter' AND "name" =~/^$disk$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "rack" =~ /^$rack$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("dc" = 'datacenter' AND "name" <> sda AND "host" <> '_' AND "rack" <> '_') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_time),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("dc" = 'datacenter' AND "name" <> sda AND "host" <> '_' AND "rack" <> '_') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean("in") as "in", mean("out") as "out" FROM "swap" WHERE ("dc" = 'datacenter' AND "host" <> '_' AND "rack" <> '_' )AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * ORDER BY asc

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "rack"

list.name: rack
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "rack"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "host" WHERE rack =~ /^$rack$/
